name: Paz's Adventure
description:
Press ctrl/alt to get past the title screen/dialogue, use arrow keys to move around :)

Not an actual game, just me playing around for the Game Development Society's October 2022 Mystery Jam.  All you can do is get through the logo screen, get past a short dialogue box, and jump around a bit. 

Most of the sprites (except the dialogue/font/text that says 'Adventure' in the logo) are mine, made in MS Paint. Game itself developed in GBStudio.

Paz is my cat! I always thought it'd be fun to make a game about my cat, so maybe I'll develop this idea into a little game in the future. :)
